get.description: Gets details of a live stream contained in library by its ID.

200.description: The details of the requested live stream

404.description: The requested live stream was not found

put.description: Updates the live stream object with the specified parameters and returns it

200.description: The live stream was successfully updated

404.description: The requested live stream was not found

delete.description: Deletes the live stream object and all resources associated with it. This operation cannot be undone.

200.description: The details of the requested live stream

404.description: The requested live stream was not found

200.description: The play data of the requested live stream

404.description: The requested live stream was not found

post.description: Creates a new live stream object with the specified parameters and returns it

200.description: The live stream was successfully created and returned as the response.

get.description: Returns a list of streams associated with this library and collection, if passed

parameters.name: orderBy
parameters.description: The field to order by. Possible values: date, title, status, started, ended, planned

200.description: The list of live streams associated with this library

404.description: The requested library was not found

put.description: Marks the stream as started, allowing viewers to view the stream.

200.description: The details of the started live stream

404.description: The requested live stream was not found

put.description: Stops the stream, if publishing is still ongoing, it will be stopped by the ingest server. If 'DvrEnabled' was set to true, the stream will be converted to a regular video as a VOD.This operation cannot be undone.

200.description: The details of the requested live stream

404.description: The requested live stream was not found

404.description: The requested stream was not found

get.description: Returns recent generated thumbnail object paths for the specified live stream. You can limit the number of results and optionally constrain by a time range using 'from' and 'to' in UTC.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of thumbnails to return. Default: 5

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Filter thumbnails created at or after this UTC timestamp

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: Filter thumbnails created at or before this UTC timestamp

200.description: A list of thumbnail object paths (most recent first)

404.description: The requested live stream was not found

404.description: The requested video was not found

404.description: The requested video was not found

404.description: The requested video was not found

parameters.name: jitEnabled
parameters.description: Marks whether JIT encoding should be enabled for this video (works only when Premium Encoding is enabled), overrides library settings

parameters.name: enabledResolutions
parameters.description: Comma separated list of resolutions enabled for encoding, available options: 240p, 360p, 480p, 720p, 1080p, 1440p, 2160p

parameters.name: enabledOutputCodecs
parameters.description: List of codecs that will be used to encode the file (overrides library settings). Available values: x264, vp9

parameters.name: transcribeEnabled
parameters.description: Setting this to true will enable transcription on this video. Enabling this will incur transcription charges

parameters.name: transcribeLanguages
parameters.description: Comma separated list of languages that will be used as target languages, use ISO 639-1 language codes.

parameters.name: sourceLanguage
parameters.description: Language spoken in the video, use ISO 639-1 language codes.

parameters.name: generateTitle
parameters.description: Whether video title should be generated from transcription.

parameters.name: generateDescription
parameters.description: Whether video description should be generated from transcription.

parameters.name: generateChapters
parameters.description: Whether video chapters should be generated from transcription.

parameters.name: generateMoments
parameters.description: Whether video moments should be generated from transcription.

200.description: The video was successfuly uploaded

400.description: The requested video was already uploaded

404.description: The requested video was not found

get.description: Returns the attention heatmap for a specific video, showing relative viewer interest across the timeline. May be unavailable if the feature is disabled or there isn't enough viewing data.

parameters.name: libraryId
parameters.description: The ID of the video library.

parameters.name: videoId
parameters.description: The GUID of the video.

200.description: The heatmap of the requested video.

404.description: Video not found

200.description: The play data of the requested video

404.description: The requested video was not found

200.description: The heatmap data of the requested video

404.description: The requested video was not found

get.description: Returns time-series views and watch time, plus country-level aggregates, at the library level or for a specific video. Control the time window with dateFrom/dateTo and the granularity with hourly. Basic safeguards prevent spam and bot inflation by de-duplicating sessions and ignoring obviously invalid events.

parameters.name: dateFrom
parameters.description: Optional start of the time range (UTC). If omitted or invalid, the last 30 days are returned.

parameters.name: dateTo
parameters.description: Optional end of the time range (UTC). If omitted with a valid start, defaults to now; otherwise the last 30 days are returned.

parameters.name: hourly
parameters.description: Optional. If true, returns hourly data; otherwise daily (UTC). Default is daily.

parameters.name: videoGuid
parameters.description: Optional video GUID to filter results. When omitted, returns library-level aggregates.

200.description: Statistics including time-series views and watch time, country breakdowns, and engagement score when available.

404.description: Video not found (when filtering by videoGuid)

200.description: The details of the requested video

404.description: The requested video was not found

parameters.description: Marks whether previous file versions should be kept in storage, allows for faster repackage later on. Default is true.

videoLibraryId.description: The video library ID that contains the collection

guid.description: The unique ID of the collection

videoCount.description: The number of videos that the collection contains

totalSize.description: The total storage size of the collection

previewVideoIds.description: The IDs of videos to be used as preview icons

previewImageUrls.description: The URLs of preview images of videos in the collection

totalItems.description: The total number of items that can be returned

currentPage.description: The current page of the response

itemsPerPage.description: The number of items returned per page

items.description: The result items on the current result

success.description: Determines if the request was successful

videoLibraryId.description: The ID of the video library that the live stream belongs to

guid.description: The unique ID of the live stream

title.description: The title of the live stream

description.description: The description of the live stream

category.description: The category of the live stream

collectionId.description: The ID of the collection where the live stream belongs

public.description: Determines if the live stream is publicly accessible

status.description: The status of the live stream. See LiveStreamStatus.

dateCreated.description: The date when the live stream was created

scheduledStartTime.description: The scheduled start time of the live stream (optional)

scheduledEndTime.description: The scheduled end time of the live stream (optional)

startedAt.description: The date and time when the live stream publishing started

endedAt.description: The date and time when the live stream publishing ended

durationSeconds.description: The duration of the live stream in seconds

streamKey.description: The stream key required for publishing the live stream

playbackUrlHls.description: The HLS playback URL of the live stream

dvrEnabled.description: Determines if DVR is enabled for the live stream

dvrWindowSeconds.description: The DVR window size in seconds, required when DvrEnabled is true

recordVod.description: Determines if a VOD recording should be created for the live stream

availableResolutions.description: The available output resolutions of the live stream

width.description: The input video width in pixels

height.description: The input video height in pixels

framerate.description: The framerate of the input stream

ingestRegion.description: The primary ingest region of the live stream

peakConcurrentViewers.description: The peak number of concurrent viewers

totalViewerSeconds.description: The total viewer watch time in seconds

thumbnailFileName.description: The file name of the thumbnail inside of the storage

thumbnailUpdatedAt.description: The date and time when the thumbnail was last updated

enableCountdown.description: Determines if countdown should be shown in player before the stream start, if it was scheduled

rtmpOutputs.description: A list of up to 5 RTMP outputs that the incoming stream will be forwarded to

LiveStreamStatus.description:
0 = Unknown
1 = Created
2 = Scheduled
3 = Preview
4 = Running
5 = Ended
6 = VodProcessing
7 = Error

description.description: The description of the live stream

dvrWindowSeconds.description: The DVR window size in seconds, required when DvrEnabled is true, max is 12 hours

recordVod.description: Determines if a VOD recording should be created for the live stream

scheduledStartTime.description: The scheduled start time of the live stream (optional, UTC)

scheduledEndTime.description: The scheduled end time of the live stream (optional, UTC)

public.description: Determines if the live stream is publicly accessible, defaults to true

enableCountdown.description: Determines if countdown should be shown in player before the stream start, if it was scheduled

rtmpOutputs.description: A list of up to 5 RTMP outputs that the incoming stream will be forwarded to

videoLibraryId.description: The ID of the video library that the video belongs to

guid.description: The unique ID of the video

dateUploaded.description: The date when the video was uploaded

views.description: The number of views the video received

isPublic.description: Determines if the video is publically accessible

length.description: The duration of the video in seconds

status.description: The status of the video. See VideoModelStatus.

width.description: The width of the original video file

height.description: The height of the original video file

availableResolutions.description: The available resolutions of the video

outputCodecs.description: Encoded output codecs of the video

thumbnailCount.description: The number of thumbnails generated for this video

encodeProgress.description: The current encode progress of the video

storageSize.description: The amount of storage used by this video

captions.description: The list of captions available for the video

hasMP4Fallback.description: Determines if the video has MP4 fallback files generated

collectionId.description: The ID of the collection where the video belongs

thumbnailFileName.description: The file name of the thumbnail inside of the storage

thumbnailBlurhash.description: Thumbnail blurhash to show while the actual thumbnail is being loaded

averageWatchTime.description: The average watch time of the video in seconds

totalWatchTime.description: The total video watch time in seconds

category.description: The automatically detected category of the video

chapters.description: The list of chapters available for the video

moments.description: The list of moments available for the video

metaTags.description: The list of meta tags that have been added to the video

transcodingMessages.description: The list of transcoding messages that describe potential issues while the video was transcoding

smartGenerateStatus.description: The status of smart generate action (if triggered)

hasOriginal.description: Determines if video has the original file available in storage

VideoModelStatus.description:
0 = Created
1 = Uploaded
2 = Processing
3 = Transcoding
4 = Finished
5 = Error
6 = UploadFailed
7 = JitSegmenting
8 = JitPlaylistsCreated

srclang.description: The unique srclang shortcode for the caption

label.description: The text description label for the caption

start.description: The start time of the chapter in seconds

end.description: The end time of the chapter in seconds

label.description: The text description label for the chapter

timestamp.description: The timestamp of the moment in seconds

IssueCodes.description:
0 = Undefined
1 = StreamLengthsDifference
2 = TranscodingWarnings
3 = IncompatibleResolution
4 = InvalidFramerate
5 = VideoExceededMaxDuration
6 = AudioExceededMaxDuration
7 = OriginalCorrupted
8 = TranscriptionFailed
9 = JitIncompatible
10 = JitFailed

heatmap.description: Timeline heatmap as segment-index to intensity (0100). Keys represent consecutive segments from the start of the video; values are normalized so 100 equals the mostwatched segment. Missing segments imply 0.

viewsChart.description: Shows the number of playback starts over time, with each data point representing the count of view starts in the corresponding UTC interval (hourly or daily). It is available at both the library level (aggregated across all videos) and the video level (for a single video). A playback start is counted once per viewer session per video and empty intervals are shown as zero.

watchTimeChart.description: Shows the cumulative time viewers spent watching over time, with each data point representing total watch time in the corresponding UTC interval (hourly or daily). It is available at both the library level (aggregated across all videos) and the video level (for a single video). Rewatches and repeated visits add to the total and empty intervals are shown as zero.

countryViewCounts.description: Shows the total number of playback starts by country for the selected time range. It is available at both the library level (aggregated across all videos) and the video level (for a single video). Each countrys value reflects unique playback starts per viewer session based on IP geolocation at playback start.

countryWatchTime.description: Shows the total watch time by country for the selected time range. It is available at both the library level (aggregated across all videos) and the video level (for a single video). Values reflect cumulative viewing time (rewatches and repeated visits add to the total) based on IP geolocation at playback start.

engagementScore.description: Indicates how engaging a specific video is on a 0100 scale based on viewing duration and viewing patterns; higher values reflect stronger viewer retention. Reported at the video level only and may be unavailable when there isnt enough viewing data.

totalItems.description: The total number of items that can be returned

currentPage.description: The current page of the response

itemsPerPage.description: The number of items returned per page
